verses.verse: O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, return <S%H7725><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; for thou hast fallen <S%H3782><s%> by thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> with you words <S%H1697><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: say <S%H559><s%> unto him, Take away <S%H5375><s%> all iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and receive <S%H3947><s%> us graciously <S%H2896><s%>: so will we render <S%H7999><s%> the calves <S%H6499><s%> of our lips <S%H8193><s%>.

Asshur <S%H804><s%> shall not save <S%H3467><s%> us; we will not ride <S%H7392><s%> upon horses <S%H5483><s%>: neither will we say <S%H559><s%> any more to the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands <S%H3027><s%>, Ye are our gods <S%H430><s%>: for in thee the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> findeth mercy <S%H7355><s%>.
Â¶ I will heal <S%H7495><s%> their backsliding <S%H4878><s%>, I will love <S%H157><s%> them freely <S%H5071><s%>: for mine anger <S%H639><s%> is turned away <S%H7725><s%> from him.
I will be as the dew <S%H2919><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%>: he shall grow <S%H6524><s%> as the lily <S%H7799><s%>, and cast forth <S%H5221><s%> his roots <S%H8328><s%> as Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.
His branches <S%H3127><s%> shall spread <S%H3212><s%>, and his beauty <S%H1935><s%> shall be as the olive tree <S%H2132><s%>, and his smell <S%H7381><s%> as Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

They that dwell <S%H3427><s%> under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%>; they shall revive <S%H2421><s%> as the corn <S%H1715><s%>, and grow <S%H6524><s%> as the vine <S%H1612><s%>: the scent <S%H2143><s%> thereof shall be as the wine <S%H3196><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall say, What have I to do any more with idols <S%H6091><s%>? I have heard <S%H6030><s%> him, and observed <S%H7789><s%> him: I am like a green <S%H7488><s%> fir tree <S%H1265><s%>. From me is thy fruit <S%H6529><s%> found <S%H4672><s%>.

Who is wise <S%H2450><s%>, and he shall understand <S%H995><s%> these things? prudent <S%H995><s%>, and he shall know <S%H3045><s%> them? for the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are right <S%H3477><s%>, and the just <S%H6662><s%> shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in them: but the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%> therein.
